mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.certificate_type_id AS "certificateTypeId", a.certificate_type_name AS "certificateTypeName", a.certificate_code AS "certificateCode", a.certificate_name AS "certificateName", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.establish_date AS "establishDate", a.effective_date_star AS "effectiveDateStar", a.effective_date_end AS "effectiveDateEnd", a.registered_type AS "registeredType", a.registered_capital AS "registeredCapital", a.address AS "address", a.persion_name AS "persionName", a.persion_id_type AS "persionIdType", a.person_id AS "personId", a.persion_phone AS "persionPhone", a.handler_name AS "handlerName", a.handler_id_type AS "handlerIdType", a.handler_id AS "handlerId", a.handler_phone AS "handlerPhone", a.scope AS "scope.id", a.building_name AS "buildingName", a.floor_number AS "floorNumber", a.path AS "path" a.status AS "status" a.use_area AS "useArea", a.usage1 AS "usage1", a.dealfire_facilities AS "dealfireFacilities", a.postcode AS "postcode", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.opinion1 AS "opinion1", a.opinion2 AS "opinion2", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.opinion3 AS "opinion3", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.opinion4 AS "opinion4", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o6.name AS "office.name", a28.name AS "area.name", a27.name AS "scope.name", u.name AS "createBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o6 ON o6.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_area a28 ON a28.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN business_scope a27 ON a27.id = a.scope LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM business_license a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.certificate_type_id LIKE '%'||#{certificateTypeId}||'%' '%'+#{certificateTypeId}+'%' concat('%',#{certificateTypeId},'%')
AND a.certificate_name LIKE '%'||#{certificateName}||'%' '%'+#{certificateName}+'%' concat('%',#{certificateName},'%')
AND a.office_id LIKE '%'||#{office.id}||'%' '%'+#{office.id}+'%' concat('%',#{office.id},'%')
AND a.registered_type LIKE '%'||#{registeredType}||'%' '%'+#{registeredType}+'%' concat('%',#{registeredType},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_license( id, proc_ins_id, certificate_type_id, certificate_type_name, certificate_code, certificate_name, office_id, establish_date, effective_date_star, effective_date_end, registered_type, registered_capital, address, persion_name, persion_id_type, person_id, persion_phone, handler_name, handler_id_type, handler_id, handler_phone, scope, building_name, floor_number, path, status, use_area, usage1, dealfire_facilities, postcode, area_id, create_by, opinion1, opinion2, create_date, update_by, opinion3, update_date, opinion4, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{certificateTypeId}, #{certificateTypeName}, #{certificateCode}, #{certificateName}, #{office.id}, #{establishDate}, #{effectiveDateStar}, #{effectiveDateEnd}, #{registeredType}, #{registeredCapital}, #{address}, #{persionName}, #{persionIdType}, #{personId}, #{persionPhone}, #{handlerName}, #{handlerIdType}, #{handlerId}, #{handlerPhone}, #{scope.id}, #{buildingName}, #{floorNumber}, #{path}, #{status}, #{useArea}, #{usage1}, #{dealfireFacilities}, #{postcode}, #{area.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{opinion1}, #{opinion2}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{opinion3}, #{updateDate}, #{opinion4}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_license SET certificate_type_id = #{certificateTypeId}, certificate_type_id = #{certificateTypeName}, certificate_code = #{certificateCode}, certificate_name = #{certificateName}, office_id = #{office.id}, establish_date = #{establishDate}, effective_date_star = #{effectiveDateStar}, effective_date_end = #{effectiveDateEnd}, registered_type = #{registeredType}, registered_capital = #{registeredCapital}, address = #{address}, persion_name = #{persionName}, persion_id_type = #{persionIdType}, person_id = #{personId}, persion_phone = #{persionPhone}, handler_name = #{handlerName}, handler_id_type = #{handlerIdType}, handler_id = #{handlerId}, handler_phone = #{handlerPhone}, scope = #{scope.id}, building_name = #{buildingName}, floor_number = #{floorNumber}, path = #{path}, status = #{status}, use_area = #{useArea}, usage1 = #{usage1}, dealfire_facilities = #{dealfireFacilities}, postcode = #{postcode}, area_id = #{area.id}, opinion1 = #{opinion1}, opinion2 = #{opinion2}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, opinion3 = #{opinion3}, update_date = #{updateDate}, opinion4 = #{opinion4}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
